headline: T-Mobile Announces Proposed Public Offering of Euro-Denominated Senior Notes
summary: BELLEVUE, Wash., February 12, 2026--T-Mobile US, Inc. (NASDAQ: TMUS) ("T-Mobile") announced today that T-Mobile USA, Inc., its direct wholly-owned subsidiary ("T-Mobile USA" or the "Issuer"), plans to offer, subject to market and other conditions, euro-denominated senior notes (the "notes") in a registered public offering. T-Mobile USA intends to use the net proceeds from the offering for general corporate purposes, which may include among other things, share repurchases, any dividends declared

content.title: T-Mobile Announces Proposed Public Offering of Euro-Denominated Senior Notes
content.summary: BELLEVUE, Wash., February 12, 2026--T-Mobile US, Inc. (NASDAQ: TMUS) ("T-Mobile") announced today that T-Mobile USA, Inc., its direct wholly-owned subsidiary ("T-Mobile USA" or the "Issuer"), plans to offer, subject to market and other conditions, euro-denominated senior notes (the "notes") in a registered public offering. T-Mobile USA intends to use the net proceeds from the offering for general corporate purposes, which may include among other things, share repurchases, any dividends declared
